fr.upem.jeu.hanabi.io

Class Parameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upem.jeu.hanabi.io.Parameter

  • public final class Parameter
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Axel Durand This class is a Singleton which contain the parameter which are launched in a game.
